thread.title: OptionsCity Rolls Out Exchange Solutions Suite
thread.title_full: OptionsCity Rolls Out Exchange Solutions Suite

title: OptionsCity Rolls Out Exchange Solutions Suite
text:
Dan Rooney, vice president of sales, OptionCity. OptionsCity Rolls Out Exchange Solutions Suite Send to Kindle 
Chicago-based OptionsCity has launched Exchange Solutions, a suite of products aimed at global exchanges. 
The Exchange Solution suite release follows July's launch of cloud-based trading platform CityTrader and is aimed at allowing global exchanges to "expand their technology and drive visibility and liquidity," according to OptionsCity . 
The product suite leverages versions of the CityTrader and Metro NOW platforms, and the City API set of application program interfaces of real-time futures and options on futures data. Exchange Solutions covers exchange activities for settlement, risk management, margining and historical trading data. Topics :
